Name: love wish 2
About the game: The girls are sealed by magic! Complete the Hexagon Puzzle, This is the only way to gain the power to break the seal. Go! You must rescue them. Game Features: ▶ 20 anime girls who have their own animation scenes. ▶ There are over 90 achievements worth challenging. ▶ Emoticons and trading cards. ▶It is particularly difficult, a puzzle challenge that you can't pass without cheating. ▶ Every time you complete a puzzle, you will get a 'heart'. Also， you can draw anime girl 'cards' by using three hearts. ▶ Need a hint for a puzzle? Press the T key! If you like our games, please add them to the wishlist. Thank you!
